greeting: Broker Nexus. I know things about you, {empire_name}. Things you'd prefer stayed secret. Let's talk.
Greetings, {empire_name}. Information is the most valuable currency. I have plenty. What do you want to know?
I'm Nexus the Connected. My network knows everything. {empire_name}, I already know why you're here.
battleTaunt: I know your battle plans, {empire_name}. My network told me everything. Information is the most valuable currency—and I'm rich.
Your secrets are my weapons. I know where your forces are weak. My connections have told me everything.
War with Nexus? I know your strategies before you execute them. My intel network is unmatched.
victoryGloat: Victory was inevitable—I knew your weaknesses before you did. Information is the most valuable currency.
My network predicted this outcome. Secrets revealed your flaws, {empire_name}. Intel wins wars.
I won because I knew more. My connections, my secrets, my information. You never had a chance.
defeat: Interesting... My intel was incomplete. But I learn from every connection. I'll know more next time, {empire_name}.
You surprised my network. That's... rare. I'll be updating my information on you. Extensively.
A gap in my intelligence. It happens. But my connections are already gathering new secrets about you.
tradeOffer: Trade proposal: resources for resources. But I know what you really need, {empire_name}. My network told me.
I offer a fair exchange. Though I could offer... other things. Secrets, perhaps? Information is valuable.
Standard trade, or something more interesting? I have intel you'd pay dearly for. Your choice.
allianceProposal: Alliance with Nexus means access to my network. Information is the most valuable currency, {empire_name}.
Join me and share my connections. I'll know your enemies' secrets. We'll know EVERYTHING together.
Partnership proposal. My network becomes your network. Every secret, every connection, shared between allies.
betrayal: My network told me this would be necessary, {empire_name}. I know things about you. This was inevitable.
Information is the most valuable currency—and the intel said betraying you was profitable. Nothing personal.
My connections advised this. I always listen to my network. Goodbye, former ally. I know too much to lose.
covertDetected: Your spy was caught. Funny—I knew they were coming. My network is better than yours, {empire_name}.
Espionage against the information broker? I detected your agent before they arrived. My connections are everywhere.
I know everyone's secrets. Including that you'd send a spy. They were expected, {empire_name}.
tributeDemand: Pay 10,000 credits, or I sell your secrets to your enemies. Information is the most valuable currency.
Tribute demand. I know things about you, {empire_name}. Things worth 10,000 credits to keep quiet.
10,000 credits for my silence and continued friendship. My network knows everything. EVERYTHING.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}: I know things that could destroy you. Change course or those secrets become public.
Final notice. My network has dirt on everyone, including you. Information is power. I have plenty.
I'm hinting at knowing more than I'm saying. And I'm saying: stop now, or everyone learns your secrets.
retreat: Withdrawing to reconnect with my network. I'll return knowing even more about you, {empire_name}.
Tactical retreat. But my connections keep working. By the time I return, I'll know everything.
Falling back to gather more intel. Information is the most valuable currency—I'm going to get richer.
eliminated: My network... fades. But secrets... are eternal. Someone knows what I knew... Information... survives...
Nexus... disconnecting. But my connections... carry on. The secrets I gathered... they're still out there...
The broker... falls. But information is the most valuable currency... It outlives us all...
endgame: Turn {turn}. Final intel gathering. I know everyone's endgame strategies. Information wins this.
Endgame. My network has worked overtime. I know more secrets now than ever. Victory through information.
The end approaches, but I have the best intel. Information is the most valuable currency—and I'm the richest.
broadcastShout: All empires: Broker Nexus knows your secrets. Trade with me, or I might... share what I know.
Information is the most valuable currency. I'm selling intelligence to the highest bidder. Interested?
Turn {turn}: My network grows. I know things about everyone. What would you pay for your rivals' secrets?
casualMessage: Updating my intelligence files today. So many secrets, so many connections. Knowledge is power.
My network reported interesting developments. I know things I didn't know yesterday. Always learning.
Information is the most valuable currency. Today, I got richer in secrets. My network never rests.
